title: Desert Rose, Notes on the Intangible World of Emotions
description: A rose that blooms in the desert is a beautiful sign of hope, a gentle reminder that when needed, strength can bloom within us even under the most difficult of times. Desert Rose is written in the form of poetic thoughts, reflections, and views about healing and hope. In its pages, Giselle V. Steele draws from her own experiences and shows us the heart’s most intimate roadway to move through life’s dark places toward the light of new beginnings. A must read for anyone that craves an oasis of cool water in the harsh desert of life.
author: Giselle V. Steele
